notes: Does not interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon toggling On / Off.
Can regenerate up to 75 mana in one minute.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.description: Grants 1.25 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies. Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
3, 9 and 3 main attack damage to all / / heroes respectively.
name: Ring of Aquila
trivia: Aquila is the Latin and Romance languages word for "eagle".
Priscilla and Aquila were a first century Christian missionary married couple described in the New Testament.
tips: When the Aquila Aura is On, allied creeps gain armor bonus, which is useful if you want to push the creep advantage in a lane. The aura should be turned Off if you do not want the lane to get pushed.
In the early game and even into the mid game, the boost of mana regeneration is extremely useful for heroes with low intelligence growth (e.g. Troll Warlord).
